entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SwipeView throw exception on windows #8870
  • [Android] VisualDiagnostic Adorners not being drawn if app is wrapped in Shell. #8866
  • [xamlc] improve performance of styles in ResourceDictionary #8865
  • CollectionView: SelectedItem does not get highlighted (dotNet 6.0.400-preview.22330.6) #8863
  • HttpClientHandler ClientCertificate property is null on Android #8860
  • Assembly 'Microsoft.Maui' with identity 'Microsoft.Maui, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null' uses 'Microsoft.iOS, Version=15.4.300.0 #8858
  • Overriding CreateFileProvider for BlazorWebView throws exception #8857
  • Preference not work with DateTime #8853
  • Image width are not properly applied based on its parents size #8851

Closed

  • [BUG] Published executable file fails to start in Windows #8847
  • Can't get parameters on URI activation #8855
  • HRESULT E_FAIL with Rectangle with margin and no stroke #8846
  • Platform dependent file not found #6674
    6.0-servicing
  • ActivityIndicator is not running second time navigating to page when page is singleton #8782
  • Can't get paremeters on windows URI activation #8852

PullRequests

Created

  • Tooltip Text support for Views #8864
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, .NET 7
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22368.2 to 7.0.0-preview1.22369.1 #8859
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Housekeeping] Added more Windows Device Tests (added around 800 tests) #8854
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • [iOS] Fix issue updating Slider Maximum value #7610
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-slider, 6.0-servicing
  • [Windows] Fix crash using animations and changing View sizes (negative values) #8273
    t/bug, area/animation 🎬, fatal
  • [Android] Fix readonly Editor with multiple lines #8014
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr3
  • Bump Selenium.Support from 4.1.1 to 4.3.0 #8516
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1245.22 to 1.0.1264.42 #8550
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [C] attache the right handler #8856
    area/Xaml </>, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #8603
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows] Update Border StrokeTickness even if StrokeShape is null #8520
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, partner/ui-tools
  • [MacCatalyst] Fix crash using Slider using Mac UIDeviceFamily #8757
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, fatal, control-slider
  • [build] make sure toolbox images are embedded #8806
  • [Android] Correctly notify CheckBox Color changes #7084
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox
  • [Android] Fix crash on Picker with null and fix up handler to not use INCC #8407
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-picker, 6.0-sr3
  • [Windows] Fix issue updating Entry Text without taking into account MaxLength #8674
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr4
  • [xamlc] add compiled ImageSourceConverter #8843
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • [Android] Fix issue using Entry IsPassword with IsReadOnly property #8344
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr3

Updated

  • [Android] Avoid create an unnecessary dialog in DatePickerHandler #8561
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, .NET 7
  • [Windows] Fix DatePicker TextColor property #7995
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, 6.0-sr3
  • Remove validation exceptions Slider min/max values #8560
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-slider
  • Changed default Border StrokeShape value #8521
    area/drawing ✏️, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 7
  • [iOS] Implement IsEnabled property on Editor #7611
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-servicing
  • [Windows] Fix DatePicker Format not working #7991
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, 6.0-sr3
  • Disconnect old handler after setting new handler #8781
  • [Android] Fix clear button not working on Entry #7992
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr3
  • Add AppThemeColor #8839
  • [xamlc] add compiled StrokeShapeTypeConverter #8849
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • [iOS] Fix wrong Slider ThumbImage size #8760
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-slider
  • [Android] Implement logic to move focus to next Entry #5740
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-servicing
  • [iOS] Expose ApplicationSignificantTimeChange method in lifecycle events #7526
    area/lifecycle 🔁, platform/iOS 🍎, .NET 7
  • [Android] Update Entry behavior closing the Keyboard #7635
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-servicing
  • [Android] Avoid to create the Shadow bitmap if is not neccesary (memory consumption) #8817
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [X] Optimize OnPlatform element syntax #5611
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, 6.0-servicing
